text: Do I really need this item?
subText: If you donâ€™t have one, then yes!

text: How would this item improve my day-to-day life?
subText: You can drink water anywhere, anytime!

text: Why am I really buying this item? Is it because of my peers? Is it because of an ad? Is it because of my own understanding of my needs?
subText: Buying simply because hydration is a good thing. It can also be because you just lost a water bottle so need it to carry water when you step out of your home.
Avoid plastic bottles. Try getting a steel bottle up to $35.
